data.title: Tesla unleashes Megapack battery to take on natural gas plants
data.text: Amid dipping solar investments, Tesla doubles down on energy storage.

data.title: Tesla Stock Has Optimism, Needs Profitability
data.text: From what we have seen so far, the price point at which Tesla must sell its vehicles is too low to generate a profit. The departure of Tesla’s CFO Deepak Ahuja earlier this year followed by Straubel last week suggests that management knows the current strategy is flawed.

data.title: Tesla’s Solar Business Is a Disaster
data.text: Worse, there's little chance that this former leader in residential solar can stage a comeback.
